content: Look I'll admit. I'm no Limbaugh fan. Think he's a blowhard. But thats my personal opinion. But yesterday I must admit I was in awe of the power he has over the GOP. It was impressive to see: On face the Nation Sunday morning Rahm Emanuel call Rush Limbaugh the leader of the GOP, and mention that when any Republican says something bad about Rush they have to run back and apologize say they were "misunderstood". "http://videocafe.crooksandliars.com/david/emanuel-limbaugh-voice-gop" Later that night GOP "Chairman" Michael Steele goes on CNN and says Limbaugh is "ugly and "Incendiary". "http://crooksandliars.com/david-neiwert/i-smell-right-wing-feud-offing-limba" The following day Rus goes on his show and rips Steele on the air, "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHxMyLhbLXM" "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHMBPqqZ_5w" A couple hours later THE SAME DAY Steele APOLOGIZES. Claims: "http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0309/19517.html" quote: “My intent was not to go after Rush – I have enormous respect for Rush Limbaugh,” Steele said in a telephone interview. “I was maybe a little bit inarticulate. … There was no attempt on my part to diminish his voice or his leadership.” All within a 24 hour period That my friends is what I call POWER. HE rules the GOP. It was amazing to see. Well played Mr. Limbaugh well played.
quote: “My intent was not to go after Rush – I have enormous respect for Rush Limbaugh,” Steele said in a telephone interview. “I was maybe a little bit inarticulate. … There was no attempt on my part to diminish his voice or his leadership.”
reply: Look I'll admit. I'm no Limbaugh fan. Think he's a blowhard. But thats my personal opinion. But yesterday I must admit I was in awe of the power he has over the GOP. It was impressive to see: On face the Nation Sunday morning Rahm Emanuel call Rush Limbaugh the leader of the GOP, and mention that when any Republican says something bad about Rush they have to run back and apologize say they were "misunderstood". "http://videocafe.crooksandliars.com/david/emanuel-limbaugh-voice-gop" Later that night GOP "Chairman" Michael Steele goes on CNN and says Limbaugh is "ugly and "Incendiary". "http://crooksandliars.com/david-neiwert/i-smell-right-wing-feud-offing-limba" The following day Rus goes on his show and rips Steele on the air, "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHxMyLhbLXM" "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHMBPqqZ_5w" A couple hours later THE SAME DAY Steele APOLOGIZES. Claims: "http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0309/19517.html"  All within a 24 hour period That my friends is what I call POWER. HE rules the GOP. It was amazing to see. Well played Mr. Limbaugh well played.
title: The Power of Rush

content: Well, yeah. The same way a really strong fart has power.

reply: Nothing says FUBAR better than a radio entertainer acting as the "de facto" head of the GOP.
title: The Power of Rush

content: quote: Originally posted by NickBrand: quote: Originally posted by Knele: Rush is the best thing that ever happened......for the Democratic party! I think he should run in 2012! And President Obama and the Democrats's "stimulus" / other outrageous spending bills is the best thing that has ever happened to Republicans/Blue dog democrats (Reagan Democrats). You will see a resurgance from the Fiscal Conservative Republican party members as well as Reagan Democrats because of those in the next election. Look love to see some fiscal restraint (Once the economy is back on track) but lets not act like the GOP was the party of less spending. They ran the Govt with complete control from 2002-2006 in that period they spent more money then any time since WWII. GOP lost a LOT of credibility when it comes to discussions about less spending. If they had found their backbone during the Bush years the American people would take them serious about spending issues. But now it seems like they are the party of obstruction. The American people want ideas and solution not the same ole same ole and "NO".

content: Look I'll admit. I'm no Limbaugh fan. Think he's a blowhard. But thats my personal opinion. But yesterday I must admit I was in awe of the power he has over the GOP. It was impressive to see: On face the Nation Sunday morning Rahm Emanuel call Rush Limbaugh the leader of the GOP, and mention that when any Republican says something bad about Rush they have to run back and apologize say they were "misunderstood". "http://videocafe.crooksandliars.com/david/emanuel-limbaugh-voice-gop" Later that night GOP "Chairman" Michael Steele goes on CNN and says Limbaugh is "ugly and "Incendiary". "http://crooksandliars.com/david-neiwert/i-smell-right-wing-feud-offing-limba" The following day Rus goes on his show and rips Steele on the air, "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHxMyLhbLXM" "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHMBPqqZ_5w" A couple hours later THE SAME DAY Steele APOLOGIZES. Claims: "http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0309/19517.html" quote: “My intent was not to go after Rush – I have enormous respect for Rush Limbaugh,” Steele said in a telephone interview. “I was maybe a little bit inarticulate. … There was no attempt on my part to diminish his voice or his leadership.” All within a 24 hour period That my friends is what I call POWER. HE rules the GOP. It was amazing to see. Well played Mr. Limbaugh well played.
quote: “My intent was not to go after Rush – I have enormous respect for Rush Limbaugh,” Steele said in a telephone interview. “I was maybe a little bit inarticulate. … There was no attempt on my part to diminish his voice or his leadership.”

It was impressive to see: On face the Nation Sunday morning Rahm Emanuel call Rush Limbaugh the leader of the GOP, and mention that when any Republican says something bad about Rush they have to run back and apologize say they were "misunderstood". "http://videocafe.crooksandliars.com/david/emanuel-limbaugh-voice-gop" Later that night GOP "Chairman" Michael Steele goes on CNN and says Limbaugh is "ugly and "Incendiary". "http://crooksandliars.com/david-neiwert/i-smell-right-wing-feud-offing-limba" The following day Rus goes on his show and rips Steele on the air, "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHxMyLhbLXM" "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHMBPqqZ_5w" A couple hours later THE SAME DAY Steele APOLOGIZES. Claims: "http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0309/19517.html"  All within a 24 hour period That my friends is what I call POWER. HE rules the GOP. It was amazing to see. Well played Mr. Limbaugh well played.
title: The Power of Rush

content: quote: Originally posted by NickBrand: quote: Originally posted by Knele: Rush is the best thing that ever happened......for the Democratic party! I think he should run in 2012! And President Obama and the Democrats's "stimulus" / other outrageous spending bills is the best thing that has ever happened to Republicans/Blue dog democrats (Reagan Democrats). You will see a resurgance from the Fiscal Conservative Republican party members as well as Reagan Democrats because of those in the next election. Look love to see some fiscal restraint (Once the economy is back on track) but lets not act like the GOP was the party of less spending. They ran the Govt with complete control from 2002-2006 in that period they spent more money then any time since WWII. GOP lost a LOT of credibility when it comes to discussions about less spending. If they had found their backbone during the Bush years the American people would take them serious about spending issues. But now it seems like they are the party of obstruction. The American people want ideas and solution not the same ole same ole and "NO".

reply: Really? And prior to Bush when have you ever heard that being done before? And its a moot point since they INCREASED spending along with Tax cuts.
title: The Power of Rush
